Object.Name: IPSO Analog Output
Object.Description1: This IPSO object is a generic object that can be used with any kind of analog output interface. Specific object for a given range of sensors is described later in the document, enabling to identify the type of sensors directly from its Object ID. This object may be used as a generic object if a dedicated one does not exist.

Item.Name: Analog Output Current Value
Item.Description: The current state of the analogue output.

Item.Name: Application Type
Item.Description: If present, the application type of the actuator as a string, for instance, “Thermostat”
